titleStmt.title: A proclamation, concernynge rites and ceremonies to be vsed in due fourme in the Churche of Englande, and the kynges most gracious pardon for certeyne fautes conteyned in the same
Proclamations. 1539-02-26
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

notesStmt.note: Imprint from STC; leaf containing colophon not filmed.
Imperfect as filmed; lacks second leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
